item.title: Abandoned port a loo, 18th August
item.description:
On the end of cul-de-sac (120 - 144 Abbotswood Road) Left behind after resurfacing works please arrange collection thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged traffic light, 18th August
item.description:
The right turn light from Cheltenham Road East into Down Hatherley Lane has been hit. Parts hanging off and parts in road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: The traffic light has been vandalised

item.title: Crop of 5 potholes outside and above entrance to Moat Cottage, Kidnappers Lane., 18th August
item.description:
Outside and above entrance to Moat Cottage, Kidnappers Lane. Postcode GL53 0NR. 5 potholes in a line along lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 18th August
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level difference due to tree roots 800x400x30mm tarmac patch required stats required. No vehicular access to this section. (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rough Sleeping & Stolen Goods, 18th August
item.description:
This area is attracting rough sleepers and town centre shop lifters. It is adjacent to the entrance to the tower in a HERITAGE SITE used by bell ringers. The Minster Churchyard is once again becoming an ASBO site with alcoholics and drug takers occupying this side of the churchyard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Well Walk, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign obstructs view of on coming traffic GL53 0QJ, 18th August
item.description:
Lay by at St Peter's church, gated sign dangerously situated as blocks view of on coming traffic. Isn't even boundary for Leckhampton. Post nearest rd needs moving back towards hedgerow so driver leaving lay by can see what is coming. Lot of speeding cars/vans on this stretch of road & have been trying to get something done since Oct 2023 - please help!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
